metadata.title: Psychology of Mistakes
metadata.subtitle: A take on human psychology and our learnings through life by our very own - Vishal, Krushi and Hari
metadata.author: Hari, Krushi, and Vishal
metadata.content: Hari, Krushi and Vishal talk about human psychology, right vs wrong, judgement, social bias and life lessons
metadata.keywords: life, journey, psychology, humans, right, wrong, social bias, judgement, baggage, polarized, society
